text: @MiaFarrow #FreeLeonardPeltier now. He didn’t get a death sentence when he was wrongly convicted 44 years ago and COVID-19 is rampant in ISP Coleman. Please sign the new clemency petition at https://t.co/sbiOb1yhd8. Thank you. @RonanFarrow LEONARD: Political Prisoner https://t.co/1lfVXdGeNm
